answers.answer: This can be chiari related...and i have it too.my colleagues told me it is not normal how much i drink too...
I also had it before my decompression surgery I drank all the time know it is alot but not excessive definetly chiari related!

Hi, I am a water drinker too, had a mini fridge in my office pre op to keep filled with water...lol....but, I was not driven to drink, if u know what I mean.Even blood labs can appear normal with diabetes,....there r many silent symptoms,check family history and see if there is a more advance test to rule it out if in fact it is a family trait.As for it being chiari related, not sure y, but I steer clear of soda's too, when I am thirsty only water quenches my thirst.To be safe..always rule out other medical possibilities as chiari should not be assumed as the cause for everything going on, we can have more then chiari to deal with....so do be careful and always check .

When they did your blood work did they check for diebete?  You could ask for a glucose test which they look at your levels which go back 3 months.  Before all my surgeries up until 3 months ago I was a very bad soda drinker.  Then 3 months ago I don't know what happened, but I don't drink pop any more just water.  Weird how our brains work. LOL.....I would ask for a glucose test to be done just to get this checked out.  Wishing you the best.Linda :)
yeah they did a diabetes and glucose test as well as thyroid. Everything came out normal

question: I have days where I am so thirsty that I just cant get enough water! It isnt every single day but often. Before I had found out about the Chiari I had actually went to my doctor because everyone at work was saying that it just wasnt normal to drink that much water. They did blood tests and everything they tested came back normal. I know im not dehydrated I drink plenty of water every day because I dont drink pop or anything with a lot of sugar and go to the gym nearly every night I can if I am not feeling too bad, so im conscience about how much i drink. But I drank 3 of the gallon jugs of ozarka water and still wanted more but my manager cut me off and said no that i was going to start leaking water out of my ears if i drank anymore. lol. im just wondering if this could be associated with the Chiari
title: im thirsty!!!
